title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming and start your coding journey. Explore syntax, data types, and basic algorithms in this comprehensive course. Master the art of coding with C!

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Dive deep into the world of algorithms and problem-solving techniques. Master the art of algorithm design and analysis in this challenging course. Become a problem-solving expert!

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Build a strong foundation in C++ for data structures and algorithms. Learn key concepts, pointers, and memory management. Unlock the power of C++ for DSA! and start your coding journey

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Master the core data structures used in computer science. Gain hands-on experience with linked lists, stacks, and queues. Become a data structure pro!

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Delve into object-oriented programming with Python. Learn classes, inheritance, and encapsulation for building robust applications. Create Pythonic wonders!

title: Software Engineering
description: Gain expertise in software engineering principles and practices. Explore requirements engineering, testing, and project management. Craft impeccable software!

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Learn about Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing technologies. Build scalable and reliable cloud-based solutions. Master the cloud with AWS!

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master the MySQL database management system. Design efficient databases and optimize queries for performance. Become a MySQL maestro!

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills with real-world challenges. Tackle complex problems and develop creative solutions. Level up your problem-solving game!
